name: Vertical Diamond Deliveries
description:
Deliver the diamond you are carrying to the owner's door.

Hold the mouse to preview your jump, look around with the mouse, then confirm by pressing jump

Respawn takes you to the last place you jumped from.

If the respawn place is bad, jumping down for a few hundred metres then respawning again should fix it.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 (Deeper and deeper theme)
